sentences.en: a $5 tip
sentences.cn: 5 美元的小费

sentences.en: A sarcastic remark was on the tip of her tongue.
sentences.cn: 挖苦的话到了她嘴边却没说出来。

sentences.en: Did you leave a tip ?
sentences.cn: 你留小费了吗？

sentences.en: Did you tip the waiter?
sentences.cn: 你给侍应生小费了吗？

sentences.en: Draw the basic outlines in black felt-tip pen (see fig. 4).
sentences.cn: 用黑色毡头笔画出基本轮廓（见图4）。

sentences.en: gardening tips
sentences.cn: 园艺小窍门

sentences.en: He kissed the tip of her nose.
sentences.cn: 他吻了一下她的鼻尖。

sentences.en: He tip-toed to the door in his stockinged feet.
sentences.cn: 他踮着脚尖走到门口，只穿着袜子没穿鞋。

sentences.en: Her hair was thick, glossy and in tip-top condition.
sentences.cn: 她的头发浓密亮泽，发质好得没话说。

sentences.en: her proven current form &B{tips the scales in her favour}.
sentences.cn: 她目前表现的确不错，使局面变得对她很有利。

sentences.en: His helmet had tipped forward and the boy pushed it back.
sentences.cn: 头盔向前耷拉下来，男孩把它往后推了推。

sentences.en: his name's on the tip of my tongue!.
sentences.cn: 他的名字就在我嘴边（可就是想不起）!。

sentences.en: his name's on the tip of my tongue!.
sentences.cn: 他的名字就在我嘴边（可就是想不起）!。

sentences.en: Hurricane Andrew has passed over the southern tip of Florida.
sentences.cn: 飓风“安德鲁”已越过佛罗里达州南端。

sentences.en: I've a tip for the races.
sentences.cn: 我有一条关于赛马比赛的内部消息。

sentences.en: It is usual to tip waiters, porters, guides and drivers.
sentences.cn: 给服务员、行李搬运工、导游和司机小费是惯例。

sentences.en: It shows how to prepare a resume, and gives tips on applying for jobs.
sentences.cn: 它说明了如何准备一份简历，并提了一些有关求职的建议。

sentences.en: She bit the tip of her left thumb, not looking at me.
sentences.cn: 她咬着左手的拇指尖，眼睛也不看我。

sentences.en: She poked and shifted things with the tip of her walking stick.
sentences.cn: 她用手杖尖翻拨挪动东西。

sentences.en: The above complaints are, I suspect, just the tip of the iceberg.
sentences.cn: 我想，以上的抱怨只是冰山一角。

sentences.en: The tail tapered to a rounded tip.
sentences.cn: 尾部越来越细，最后成了个圆尖。

sentences.en: they were arrested after police were tipped off by local residents.
sentences.cn: 当地居民暗中通知警察后他们被逮捕了。

sentences.en: this phone tips the scales at only 150 g.
sentences.cn: 这个电话机重量只有150克。

sentences.en: Tip away the salt and wipe the pan.
sentences.cn: 把盐倒掉，把锅擦净。

sentences.en: tip in a color plate.
sentences.cn: 加入一张彩页

sentences.en: Tip the vegetables into a bowl.
sentences.cn: 把蔬菜倒进碗里。

sentences.en: United are still my tip for the Title.
sentences.cn: 我仍然认定联队会夺冠。

sentences.en: We grabbed it just as it was about to tip over.
sentences.cn: 我们在它就要翻倒时把它抓住了。

裂纹尖端，裂纹端
电极头，电极端；电极端片
过滤嘴；香烟的滤嘴
指尖；（射箭等用的）指尖套
付小费；给小费

phrases.phrase: on the tip of one's tongue
phrases.tran_cn: 就在某人的嘴边，某人差一点就能想起的
桩端；桩头
根尖
茎尖
显露：揭示自己的财产或目的

phrases.phrase: tip (或 turn) the scales (或 balance)
phrases.tran_cn: （状况，事件）起决定性作用；扭转局面
称得重量为
顶锥角，顶圆锥角；顶端角，顶尖角
叶尖间隙；尖端间隙；齿顶间隙
用手指将球送入蓝中；在书页间装订处粘附插面
加入：用粘贴的方式在书中加（一个插页）
每日提示；每日一帖
冰山一角；事物的表面部分
向…透露消息，泄密；暗中通知某人
(美，非正式)无意中流露自己的意图
以手触帽檐（或脱帽）致敬
使翻倒
齿顶圆角半径
(非正式)向某人透露消息，暗中通知某人
(英，非正式)向某人送暗号（或使眼色）
起决定性作用，扭转局势，改变局面，举足轻重
相抵：一个局势的平衡
梢涡，翼尖涡流
（飞机的）翼尖；翼波状盖饰男皮鞋

trans.tran_cn: 尖/顶端，小费，提示，忠告，预测，垃圾场，脏乱地
trans.tran_en: a small amount of additional money that you give to someone such as a  waiter  or a taxi driver

trans.tran_cn: （使）倾斜，倾倒，轻触，扔掉，给小费，预言…会成功
trans.tran_en: to give an additional amount of money to someone such as a  waiter  or taxi driver
to give an additional amount of money to someone such as a  waiter  or taxi driver
